para.programlisting:
#include <opensc.h>
int sc_get_cache_dir(struct sc_context *ctx, char *buf, size_t bufsize);

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: This function stores the OpenSC cache directory for the current user in the buffer pointed to by buf, which is bufsize bytes long.

refsect1.title: Return value
refsect1.para: Returns 0 if successful, or a negative value in case of error.
